comment.author: 54000959@N06
comment._content: According to the 1897/98 LAIN'S DIRECTORY for Brooklyn, this establishment was located at 883 Flatbush Avenue (corner of Church Avenue). www.bklyn-genealogy-info.com/Directory/1897/b.html Map: goo.gl/maps/1jOKD

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On February 09, 2013, Herb Lubalin Study Center suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
